Params: {2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Does your belief really align with ours?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fundamentally speaking.', 3: '8', 4: 'Some of it, at the very least.', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hmph, what a diplomatic way to put it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Not that I don't believe in you. I've seen the choices you made during our previous fights together.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But Oasis is still too fragile at the moment. I have to protect it as its leader.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "One day... I'll let you be among them. Truly among them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why will that day come?', 3: '14', 4: 'How long do humans have to wait?', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If we can work on it together... I'm sure it won't be long...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Construct', 3: 'Sir! A group of Corrupted spotted in the west! They launched an attack!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You stay right here! Don't get any closer!", 4: '1'}
